helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear Thyrocare Support Team,

I am writing to formally clarify the sequence of events and request an
appropriate resolution for the continued service failure experienced during
my booked test.

To clearly state the facts:

I had booked tests for two different individuals.

During the initial visit, due to the phlebotomist’s error, samples were
collected only for my mother and all tests were wrongly assigned to her,
leaving my tests uncollected.

This was not explained or communicated at the time of collection.


Following my complaint:

The order was rescheduled, and the technician took the OTP from me in
advance, stating he would arrive within an hour.

Payment was taken only once, not multiple times.

However, despite OTP being taken, the technician did not arrive for sample
collection, which is a serious violation of Thyrocare’s OTP and collection
protocol.


Please note that:

OTP should only be taken after successful sample collection, not in advance.

Taking OTP without providing service is unacceptable and raises serious
concerns.

The repeated inconvenience is occurring solely due to operational and
technician-level failures, with no fault on my part.


In view of the above, I request:

1. Immediate refund of the amount paid, OR


2. Immediate and confirmed re-collection by a senior phlebotomist, at no
additional cost, with prior confirmation of arrival.



Please treat this matter as urgent and confirm the action taken along with
timelines.

Regards,
[Your Full Name]
Registered Mobile Number: [XXXXXXX]
Order ID(s): [Order ID(s)]

--

and/or privileged material. The information contained in this e-mail is

you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any

notes.body_html:
Dear Sir,

I have attempted to call the patient multiple times, but the calls continue to go to voicemail.

Please ask the patient to provide a specific time when they will be available so that we may successfully connect with them. 

Best regards,
Karishma Patil. 

On Tue, Dec 16, 2025 at 5:07 PM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble 

The customer says no one is picking up the call. Kindly call the customer



Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 6:37 PM Mamata Nilkanth Kamble <mamata.kamble@docon.co.in> wrote:
Hello,

They may reach us at +91 9920181181. We are available Monday through Saturday, from 10:00 AM to 8:00 PM.  

Regards,
Mamta K.

On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 5:40 PM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble 

Can the number be provided where Cx can call?



Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 5:18 PM Mamata Nilkanth Kamble <mamata.kamble@docon.co.in> wrote:
Hello,

We again attempted to contact the patient; however, the call was directed to voicemail.
Regards,
Mamta K.

On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 5:14 PM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble 

Please try again. 

Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 1:05 PM Mamata Nilkanth Kamble <mamata.kamble@docon.co.in> wrote:
Hello,

We attempted to reach the patient, but the call went to voicemail.
Regards,
Mamta K.

On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 11:42 AM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
Please update.

Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 10:41 AM Naveen Kumar Ram <naveen.ram@docon.co.in> wrote:
@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble  Please check this immediately



Best.
Naveen Ram.

@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble @Naveen Kumar Ram 

The customer has again contacted us about this issue. Kindly connect with the customer & resolve.




Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Wed, Nov 26, 2025 at 9:11 PM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble 

The customer has asked to arrange a callback. Kindly do the needful.



Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Wed, Nov 26, 2025 at 12:41 PM Mamata Nilkanth Kamble <mamata.kamble@docon.co.in> wrote:
Hello Sir, 

I have spoken with the patient at the provided number and have also accessed the application on my phone. However, I am still unable to locate the "View Prescription" option required to book the appointment. To assist us in resolving this issue, I have requested a screenshot of the patient's application, which we can then forward to the Technical Team. 

Best, 
Mamta K.

@Karishma Patil @Mamata Nilkanth Kamble  Any update here ?

Naveen Ram.

notes.body:
Hello Sir,

We have attempted to contact the patient using the alternate number
provided (7904877972). However, the calls are being disconnected. In one
instance, the patient answered but ended the call shortly thereafter.

Please advise the patient to contact our official support line at +91
9920181181 at their convenience.

Best,
Karishma Patil.

On Tue, Dec 16, 2025 at 6:03 PM Grievance Officer <
grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:

> @Karishma Patil <karishma.patil@docon.co.in>
>
> Did we try the alternate number below as well?
>
> 7904877972
>
> Regards,
> Grievance Helpdesk
>
>
> On Tue, Dec 16, 2025 at 5:57 PM Karishma Patil <karishma.patil@docon.co.in>
> wrote:

>> Dear Sir,

>>

>> available so that we may successfully connect with them.
>>
>> Best regards,
>> Karishma Patil.
>>

notes.body_html:
Hello Sir, 

We have attempted to contact the patient using the alternate number provided (7904877972). However, the calls are being disconnected. In one instance, the patient answered but ended the call shortly thereafter.

Please advise the patient to contact our official support line at +91 9920181181 at their convenience.

Best, 
Karishma Patil. 

On Tue, Dec 16, 2025 at 6:03 PM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Karishma Patil 

Did we try the alternate number below as well?

7904877972

Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Tue, Dec 16, 2025 at 5:57 PM Karishma Patil <karishma.patil@docon.co.in> wrote:
Dear Sir,

I have attempted to call the patient multiple times, but the calls continue to go to voicemail.

Please ask the patient to provide a specific time when they will be available so that we may successfully connect with them. 

Best regards,
Karishma Patil. 

On Tue, Dec 16, 2025 at 5:07 PM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble 

The customer says no one is picking up the call. Kindly call the customer



Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 6:37 PM Mamata Nilkanth Kamble <mamata.kamble@docon.co.in> wrote:
Hello,

They may reach us at +91 9920181181. We are available Monday through Saturday, from 10:00 AM to 8:00 PM.  

Regards,
Mamta K.

On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 5:40 PM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble 

Can the number be provided where Cx can call?



Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 5:18 PM Mamata Nilkanth Kamble <mamata.kamble@docon.co.in> wrote:
Hello,

We again attempted to contact the patient; however, the call was directed to voicemail.
Regards,
Mamta K.

On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 5:14 PM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble 

Please try again. 

Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 1:05 PM Mamata Nilkanth Kamble <mamata.kamble@docon.co.in> wrote:
Hello,

We attempted to reach the patient, but the call went to voicemail.
Regards,
Mamta K.

On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 11:42 AM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
Please update.

Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 10:41 AM Naveen Kumar Ram <naveen.ram@docon.co.in> wrote:
@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble  Please check this immediately



Best.
Naveen Ram.



On Sat, Dec 13, 2025 at 8:32 PM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble @Naveen Kumar Ram 

The customer has again contacted us about this issue. Kindly connect with the customer & resolve.




Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Wed, Nov 26, 2025 at 9:11 PM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble 

The customer has asked to arrange a callback. Kindly do the needful.



Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Wed, Nov 26, 2025 at 12:41 PM Mamata Nilkanth Kamble <mamata.kamble@docon.co.in> wrote:
Hello Sir, 

I have spoken with the patient at the provided number and have also accessed the application on my phone. However, I am still unable to locate the "View Prescription" option required to book the appointment. To assist us in resolving this issue, I have requested a screenshot of the patient's application, which we can then forward to the Technical Team. 

Best, 
Mamta K.

On Wed, Nov 26, 2025 at 10:34 AM Naveen Kumar Ram <naveen.ram@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Karishma Patil @Mamata Nilkanth Kamble  Any update here ?


Regards
Naveen Ram.

On Wed, Nov 26, 2025 at 8:42 AM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble @Naveen Kumar Ram 

Awaiting update.

Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Tue, Nov 25, 2025 at 7:45 PM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
Any update on this?

Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Tue, Nov 25, 2025 at 11:53 AM Naveen Kumar Ram <naveen.ram@docon.co.in> wrote:
@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble  Please call the patient and check the issue.


Best.
Naveen Ram.



On Tue, Nov 25, 2025 at 11:45 AM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
Hello Naveen,

Registered Mobile Number: 7358387573
Cx is unable to view the prescriptions. Kindly check & update.



Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk

notes.body:
Team,

I just spoke to the patient, This seems to be a tech issue. I'll get back
to you on this.

Please allow me sometime, I've informed the same to the patient.


Best.
Naveen Ram.

notes.body_html:
Team, 

I just spoke to the patient, This seems to be a tech issue. I'll get back to you on this.

Please allow me sometime, I've informed the same to the patient.


Best.
Naveen Ram.



On Wed, Dec 17, 2025 at 8:03 AM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Naveen Kumar Ram 

Kindly update.

Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Tue, Dec 16, 2025 at 6:49 PM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Naveen Kumar Ram 

How can this be resolved? Can the customer be contacted via email and share the details if the team is unable to contact?  Cx is also unable to contact the number provided.

Cx email id - jayenthirakumar@gmail.com




Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Tue, Dec 16, 2025 at 6:25 PM Karishma Patil <karishma.patil@docon.co.in> wrote:
Hello Sir, 

We have attempted to contact the patient using the alternate number provided (7904877972). However, the calls are being disconnected. In one instance, the patient answered but ended the call shortly thereafter.

Please advise the patient to contact our official support line at +91 9920181181 at their convenience.

Best, 
Karishma Patil. 

On Tue, Dec 16, 2025 at 6:03 PM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Karishma Patil 

Did we try the alternate number below as well?

7904877972

Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Tue, Dec 16, 2025 at 5:57 PM Karishma Patil <karishma.patil@docon.co.in> wrote:
Dear Sir,

I have attempted to call the patient multiple times, but the calls continue to go to voicemail.

Please ask the patient to provide a specific time when they will be available so that we may successfully connect with them. 

Best regards,
Karishma Patil. 

On Tue, Dec 16, 2025 at 5:07 PM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble 

The customer says no one is picking up the call. Kindly call the customer



Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 6:37 PM Mamata Nilkanth Kamble <mamata.kamble@docon.co.in> wrote:
Hello,

They may reach us at +91 9920181181. We are available Monday through Saturday, from 10:00 AM to 8:00 PM.  

Regards,
Mamta K.

On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 5:40 PM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble 

Can the number be provided where Cx can call?



Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 5:18 PM Mamata Nilkanth Kamble <mamata.kamble@docon.co.in> wrote:
Hello,

We again attempted to contact the patient; however, the call was directed to voicemail.
Regards,
Mamta K.

On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 5:14 PM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble 

Please try again. 

Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 1:05 PM Mamata Nilkanth Kamble <mamata.kamble@docon.co.in> wrote:
Hello,

We attempted to reach the patient, but the call went to voicemail.
Regards,
Mamta K.

On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 11:42 AM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
Please update.

Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 10:41 AM Naveen Kumar Ram <naveen.ram@docon.co.in> wrote:
@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble  Please check this immediately



Best.
Naveen Ram.



On Sat, Dec 13, 2025 at 8:32 PM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble @Naveen Kumar Ram 

The customer has again contacted us about this issue. Kindly connect with the customer & resolve.




Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Wed, Nov 26, 2025 at 9:11 PM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble 

The customer has asked to arrange a callback. Kindly do the needful.



Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Wed, Nov 26, 2025 at 12:41 PM Mamata Nilkanth Kamble <mamata.kamble@docon.co.in> wrote:
Hello Sir, 

I have spoken with the patient at the provided number and have also accessed the application on my phone. However, I am still unable to locate the "View Prescription" option required to book the appointment. To assist us in resolving this issue, I have requested a screenshot of the patient's application, which we can then forward to the Technical Team. 

Best, 
Mamta K.

On Wed, Nov 26, 2025 at 10:34 AM Naveen Kumar Ram <naveen.ram@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Karishma Patil @Mamata Nilkanth Kamble  Any update here ?


Regards
Naveen Ram.

On Wed, Nov 26, 2025 at 8:42 AM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble @Naveen Kumar Ram 

Awaiting update.

Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Tue, Nov 25, 2025 at 7:45 PM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
Any update on this?

Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Tue, Nov 25, 2025 at 11:53 AM Naveen Kumar Ram <naveen.ram@docon.co.in> wrote:
@Mamata Nilkanth Kamble  Please call the patient and check the issue.


Best.
Naveen Ram.

Registered Mobile Number: 7358387573
Cx is unable to view the prescriptions. Kindly check & update.



Regards,

notes.body_html:
Hello Sagar,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

As per telephonic conversation, We wish to inform you that, your appointment has been rescheduled for ​17-12-25 | 08:00 am - 08:30 am
Further, you will be getting phlebotomist details prior day at 6:00 PM and will be informed by SMS and Email both.

We sincerely regret the inconvenience caused to you.


Regards,
Shruti Vaviya

notes.body_html:
Hi Akshayv,

Please update this in the TSP tracker

On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 12:11 PM akshayv nalavade <akshayv.nalavade@ahwspl.com> wrote:
@Kartik Sharma @Priyanshu Singh Kindly check the footage Link. Let us know whats the issue with the delivery.



On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 10:45 AM Devansh Jaiswal <devansh.jaiswal@aarman.in> wrote:
Hi Team,

The customer is continually reaching out regarding this issue. Please check the status of this order immediately and take the necessary action to resolve the complaint as soon as possible.

Warm regards,
Devansh Jaiswal

On Sun, Dec 14, 2025 at 9:54 AM 'Grievance Officer' via Inbound <Inbound@aarman.in> wrote:
+akshayv nalavade +Aakash Kamble 

Kindly update.


Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Sat, Dec 13, 2025 at 8:50 AM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
+akshayv nalavade +Aakash Kamble 

Kindly update.

Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Fri, Dec 12, 2025 at 5:26 PM Afrin Sayyed <afrin.sayyed@aarman.in> wrote:
 653726198280949760-89430.mp4


+akshayv nalavade +Aakash Kamble As checked packaging footage, all the requested medicines were properly packed and dispatched without any issues. Something serious seems to be happening at the partner end, as the customer has received a different product. Similar issues have also been observed in reverse cases where retailers received incorrect products.

We need immediate action on this and an RCA if anything incorrect is happening.

Warm Regards,
Afrin Sayyed.
 


On Fri, Dec 12, 2025 at 1:44 PM Priyanshu Singh <priyanshu.singh@shiprocket.com> wrote:
Hi Akshayv,

Please share the packaging and unboxing video for further investigation

On Fri, Dec 12, 2025 at 11:56 AM akshayv nalavade <akshayv.nalavade@ahwspl.com> wrote:
@Kartik Sharma @Priyanshu Singh 

AWB - BSRP2702696659
Order was delivered in the wrong and missing items condition.

@Afrin Sayyed Please share WH packing video for reference.


On Fri, Dec 12, 2025 at 10:40 AM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Sachin Kistappa 
+Aakash Kamble +akshayv nalavade +Amit Bhardwaj +Mrinal Shekhar 

Kindly update on this at the earliest, very urgently.

653726198280949760-89430
BSRP2702696659
FL1181721519
Amount paid - 2816.81

Items ordered

Cx claims none of the above items were delivered and below items were received.

























Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Fri, Dec 12, 2025 at 10:01 AM Jobin Mathai <jobin.mathai@aarman.in> wrote:
+
Warm Regards,
Jobin Joy


On Sun, Dec 7, 2025 at 12:45 PM Sachin Kistappa <sachin.kistappa@aarman.in> wrote:
Hi Afrin 

We usually do not deliver an order if the parcel is damaged or not in intact condition. At the time of receipt, the shipment weight was captured as 500 grams, and if this matches, we proceed accordingly. For safety purposes, we have asked the partner to confirm if any mishap occurred. Kindly allow us some time; we will update you shortly after our investigation.


Warm regards 
Sachin Kistappa
Courier Team 

On Sun, Dec 7, 2025 at 12:24 PM Afrin Sayyed <afrin.sayyed@aarman.in> wrote:
+Sachin Kistappa +Courier team Can we have an update on this?

Warm Regards,
Afrin Sayyed.
 


On Thu, Dec 4, 2025 at 3:14 PM Nadeem Lohar <nadeem.lohar@aarman.in> wrote:
The customer has raised a complaint, He received the wrong medicine in a parcel. He ordered a total of 5 medicines but received 2 which were wrong, We checked with a warehouse. All the medicine was packed properly. Kindly check it from your end. Is there any issue while in transit or delivery ??

Order id #653726198280949760-89430
AWB number #BSRP2702696659

--
Regards,
Nadeem Lohar
( Pharmeasy )

We have already added the concern to the TSP sheet, and it was closed with the remark that it was an OTP verified delivery. However, as mentioned earlier, this is a short product case. Kindly recheck this from your end and update us accordingly.

07-12-2025 BSRP2702696659 1 Short Product received - Investigation required https://postimg.cc/m1t2NVTG Delivered Closed OTP Base Delivery 2025-12-10 00:00:00 4553

On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 3:26 PM 'Priyanshu Singh' via Issue Resolution <issueresolution@aarman.in> wrote:
Hi Akshayv,

Please update this in the TSP tracker

On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 12:11 PM akshayv nalavade <akshayv.nalavade@ahwspl.com> wrote:
@Kartik Sharma @Priyanshu Singh Kindly check the footage Link. Let us know whats the issue with the delivery.



On Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 10:45 AM Devansh Jaiswal <devansh.jaiswal@aarman.in> wrote:
Hi Team,

The customer is continually reaching out regarding this issue. Please check the status of this order immediately and take the necessary action to resolve the complaint as soon as possible.

Warm regards,
Devansh Jaiswal

On Sun, Dec 14, 2025 at 9:54 AM 'Grievance Officer' via Inbound <Inbound@aarman.in> wrote:
+akshayv nalavade +Aakash Kamble 

Kindly update.


Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Sat, Dec 13, 2025 at 8:50 AM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
+akshayv nalavade +Aakash Kamble 

Kindly update.

Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Fri, Dec 12, 2025 at 5:26 PM Afrin Sayyed <afrin.sayyed@aarman.in> wrote:
 653726198280949760-89430.mp4


+akshayv nalavade +Aakash Kamble As checked packaging footage, all the requested medicines were properly packed and dispatched without any issues. Something serious seems to be happening at the partner end, as the customer has received a different product. Similar issues have also been observed in reverse cases where retailers received incorrect products.

We need immediate action on this and an RCA if anything incorrect is happening.

Warm Regards,
Afrin Sayyed.
 


On Fri, Dec 12, 2025 at 1:44 PM Priyanshu Singh <priyanshu.singh@shiprocket.com> wrote:
Hi Akshayv,

Please share the packaging and unboxing video for further investigation

On Fri, Dec 12, 2025 at 11:56 AM akshayv nalavade <akshayv.nalavade@ahwspl.com> wrote:
@Kartik Sharma @Priyanshu Singh 

AWB - BSRP2702696659
Order was delivered in the wrong and missing items condition.

@Afrin Sayyed Please share WH packing video for reference.


On Fri, Dec 12, 2025 at 10:40 AM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
@Sachin Kistappa 
+Aakash Kamble +akshayv nalavade +Amit Bhardwaj +Mrinal Shekhar 

Kindly update on this at the earliest, very urgently.

653726198280949760-89430
BSRP2702696659
FL1181721519
Amount paid - 2816.81

Items ordered

Cx claims none of the above items were delivered and below items were received.

























Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk 


On Fri, Dec 12, 2025 at 10:01 AM Jobin Mathai <jobin.mathai@aarman.in> wrote:
+
Warm Regards,
Jobin Joy


On Sun, Dec 7, 2025 at 12:45 PM Sachin Kistappa <sachin.kistappa@aarman.in> wrote:
Hi Afrin 

We usually do not deliver an order if the parcel is damaged or not in intact condition. At the time of receipt, the shipment weight was captured as 500 grams, and if this matches, we proceed accordingly. For safety purposes, we have asked the partner to confirm if any mishap occurred. Kindly allow us some time; we will update you shortly after our investigation.


Warm regards 
Sachin Kistappa
Courier Team 

On Sun, Dec 7, 2025 at 12:24 PM Afrin Sayyed <afrin.sayyed@aarman.in> wrote:
+Sachin Kistappa +Courier team Can we have an update on this?

Warm Regards,
Afrin Sayyed.
 


On Thu, Dec 4, 2025 at 3:14 PM Nadeem Lohar <nadeem.lohar@aarman.in> wrote:
The customer has raised a complaint, He received the wrong medicine in a parcel. He ordered a total of 5 medicines but received 2 which were wrong, We checked with a warehouse. All the medicine was packed properly. Kindly check it from your end. Is there any issue while in transit or delivery ??

Order id #653726198280949760-89430
AWB number #BSRP2702696659

--
Regards,
Nadeem Lohar
( Pharmeasy )

As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the SCALPE PLUS EXPERT ANTI-DANDRUFF SHAMPOO WITH KETOCONAZOLE | 75ML   on 16th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.     Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your PharmEasy wallet in 24 hours.     We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. notes.body_html:
Hello Yash,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regards to your order #658174441812725760-92686, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the SCALPE PLUS EXPERT ANTI-DANDRUFF SHAMPOO WITH KETOCONAZOLE | 75ML   on 16th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.
 
Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your PharmEasy wallet in 24 hours.
 
We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
 
We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear PharmEasy Team,
Thank you for initiating the return request and arranging the pickup of the medicines. As per the tracking update 609864384836616192-35794 AWB: 9148881157940, the returned items have been successfully delivered to your Gurgaon facility.
I now request you to please confirm:
  1. Return verification status
  2. Refund amount to be processed
  3. Mode of refund – I prefer the refund to be credited back to the original source of payment (same bank account) for accounting clarity.
Since I will be placing a new order for medicines shortly, I request you to kindly expedite the refund process or confirm the expected time frame.
Please update me once the verification is complete and refund has been initiated.
Thank you once again for your support and cooperation.
Warm regards,
Danish Bhatia

notes.body: Hello Hitendra,     Greetings from PharmEasy!                 I will surely assist you with this. However, I am unable to fetch your profile details with hitendra.ojha@gmail.com. I would request you to kindly help me with the following information for verification purposes so that I can assist you further.     A Part -Mandatory Information (Any ONE)-  1. Registered contact number  2. Registered email address     AND/OR     B Part-Any ONE of the below:   1)Order ID  2) 60% of the Delivery Address (Flat no, Building Name/number, Street name, Location)  3) Patient Name  4) One of the ordered medicines on the current (if applicable) / past orders  5) Mode of Payment for the last order     Receipt of the details will help me to assist you better.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Hitendra,

Greetings from PharmEasy!            

I will surely assist you with this. However, I am unable to fetch your profile details with hitendra.ojha@gmail.com. I would request you to kindly help me with the following information for verification purposes so that I can assist you further.

A Part -Mandatory Information (Any ONE)-
1. Registered contact number
2. Registered email address

AND/OR

B Part-Any ONE of the below: 
1)Order ID
2) 60% of the Delivery Address (Flat no, Building Name/number, Street name, Location)
3) Patient Name
4) One of the ordered medicines on the current (if applicable) / past orders
5) Mode of Payment for the last order

Receipt of the details will help me to assist you better.

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Habiba
Customer Not Verified

I have booked a blood test with PharmEasy, and the sample collection
has already been completed. The payment is also done successfully.

However, I notice that the invoice/bill is scheduled to be generated
only after the test report is available. I urgently need the
bill/invoice now, as it is required for official purposes.

Could you please share the paid invoice/bill at the earliest, even
before the report is generated?

Booking details:

Registered mobile number: 9156598579

Order ID :  6265175

Date of sample collection: 15 dec 2025

Your quick support will be highly appreciated.

Thanks & regards,
Ritesh

notes.body:
Worst customer support experience. The ticket was closed without providing a proper solution.

I am already aware of your standard procedure; that is exactly why I raised a support case—to get help with this matter, as I urgently need the invoice.

The response I received was simply that the invoice will be available once the order is completed, which I already know. What I am asking for is assistance in getting the invoice ASAP, since:

The payment has already been made

Blood samples have already been collected

Given this, I do not understand why I am still required to wait for the invoice.

notes.body_html: deny for number chcnage request.

notes.body: Hello Apurva,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  I understand your concern with regard to the number change request. I will surely assist you with this.     Once a specific mobile number has been used to create an account, it cannot be changed to another number within the same account.   If you wish to place an order with a new number, please create a new account with that number.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.       Regards,  Devdas.
notes.body_html:
Hello Apurva,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand your concern with regard to the number change request. I will surely assist you with this.

Once a specific mobile number has been used to create an account, it cannot be changed to another number within the same account. 

If you wish to place an order with a new number, please create a new account with that number. 

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Devdas.

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear Customer Support Team,
​I acknowledge that my sample has been collected and the payment issue for
Order ID: 6266041 has been resolved. However, I must escalate the critical
issue concerning the viability of my mother's blood sample (Women's Master
Checkup).
​Fact of Pre-Analytical Delay:
​Collection Time: 07:33 AM
​Transport/Pickup Time: Approx. 11:00 AM
​Delay for Unspun Whole Blood: ~3.5 hours
​Demand for Quality Assurance:
​Standard laboratory best practices recommend that blood samples,
particularly those involving Glucose, LFT (AST/ALT), and Potassium, are
centrifuged and separated within two hours to prevent significant changes
in analyte concentrations.
​Therefore, I require a definitive and binding commitment from your
organization:
​Immediate Confirmation of Status: Confirm exactly when the 07:33 AM sample
was received and processed (centrifuged) at the laboratory.
​Written Guarantee: I demand a formal, written guarantee from your Lab
Director or Pathologist for Order ID: 6266041. This document must
explicitly state that despite the 3.5-hour pre-analytical delay for the
Women's Master Checkup sample, all resulting values will be accurate,
clinically reliable, and unaffected by the time delay.
​Mandatory Re-Collection: If this written guarantee cannot be provided, or
if any result is flagged with a quality concern, you are obligated to
schedule a priority, complimentary re-collection of my mother’s sample
immediately (tomorrow morning, 16th Dec 2025).

--

​Fact of Pre-Analytical Delay:
​Collection Time: 07:33 AM
​Transport/Pickup Time: Approx. 11:00 AM
​Delay for Unspun Whole Blood: ~3.5 hours
​Demand for Quality Assurance:
​Standard laboratory best practices recommend that blood samples, particularly those involving Glucose, LFT (AST/ALT), and Potassium, are centrifuged and separated within two hours to prevent significant changes in analyte concentrations.
​Therefore, I require a definitive and binding commitment from your organization:
​Immediate Confirmation of Status: Confirm exactly when the 07:33 AM sample was received and processed (centrifuged) at the laboratory.

This document must explicitly state that despite the 3.5-hour pre-analytical delay for the Women's Master Checkup sample, all resulting values will be accurate, clinically reliable, and unaffected by the time delay.

notes.body: Hello Abhinav,     Greetings from PharmEasy!   ​   ​With regards to your order #658893327674535936-10107, I see your order is under process and the medicines are being arranged. The estimated delivery date is 17th December 2025.  Your order will be delivered within the estimated delivery date committed at the time of order placement. Your patience and understanding are highly appreciated in the meantime.     I am sorry to inform you that your order #657423078367498240-84460 and 658145837934514176-25017 was cancelled due to the medicine that you added were unavailable with our Partner Retailer. I am sorry for the inconvenience caused to you.    Please note, at the time of placing the order the requested medicine was available in limited quantity and you were able to add medicines in the order. Once the medicine was added to your order our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source. However, they could not arrange one. I apologize that we were unable to fulfill your medicine requirements for this order completely.   I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restock the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request you to reach us out. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
